channel.title: India on विचारमञ्जरी (Vichāramañjarī)
channel.description: Recent content in India on विचारमञ्जरी (Vichāramañjarī)

item.title: A Short Note on CGPA | AKA | How To Approach College in India
item.description: Much is said about the importance of CGPA or its lack thereof to new students trying to navigate college life and to hopefully get a good job. The popular belief nowadays is that CGPA does not matter and it’s only one’s skills, specifically coding skills, that matter during the recruitment process. However, this is only half true. What was originally meant by this sentiment was that CGPA alone cannot get you a job.

item.title: One Train Experience | The Job Human Trafficking Racket in India
